message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,200. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value.
Bob, I'm trying to make this work, but $13,200 is cutting it too close.  My final offer is $13,600.  Let me know your decision.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $13,500. That's the lowest I can go.
